languages.text: "Всякого человека, прошедшего со мной прорыв сквозь зенитный щит, абордажный таран и бойню в разгерметизированных отсеках, я готов назвать братом".
"Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."
languages.original_text: "Всякого человека, прошедшего со мной прорыв сквозь зенитный щит, абордажный таран и бойню в разгерметизированных отсеках, я готов назвать братом".

traits.locale_text: "I'll say this to anyone — if you and I, side by side, have broken through a flak shield, rammed and boarded a vessel, and survived a massacre in depressurized modules, I can call you my brother."
"I'll say this to anyone — if you and I, side by side, have broken through a flak shield, rammed and boarded a vessel, and survived a massacre in depressurized modules, I can call you my brother."
"Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother."
"Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother."
"Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother."

languages.text: “只有那些和我一起突破高射炮的炮火，同我一起登舰作战，与我一起在减压舱的屠戮中存活下来的人，我才会称之为兄弟姐妹。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."

traits.locale_text: “只有那些和我一起突破高射炮的炮火，同我一起登舰作战，与我一起在减压舱的屠戮中存活下来的人，我才会称之为兄弟。”

languages.text: «Cualquiera que atraviese un escudo de metralla conmigo, que embista y aborde una nave conmigo y que sobreviva a una masacre en módulos despresurizados conmigo es mi hermano. O hermana».
languages.original_text: "Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquiera que atraviese un escudo de metralla conmigo, que embista y aborde una nave conmigo y que sobreviva a una masacre en módulos despresurizados conmigo es mi hermano».

languages.text: 「私と共に高射砲シールドを突破して、船に突撃して乗り込み、減圧モジュールの虐殺を共に生き延びた者達をみな、兄弟・姉妹と呼ぼう」
languages.original_text: "Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."

traits.locale_text: 「私と共に高射砲シールドを突破して、船に突撃して乗り込み、減圧モジュールの虐殺を共に生き延びた者達をみな、兄弟と呼ぼう」

languages.text: "Jeden, der an meiner Seite einen Flakschild durchbrochen, ein Schiff geentert und ein Massaker in Modulen mit Druckabfall überlebt hat, den bezeichne ich als Bruder oder Schwester."
languages.original_text: "Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."

traits.locale_text: "Jeden, der an meiner Seite einen Flakschild durchbrochen, ein Schiff geentert und ein Massaker in Modulen mit Druckabfall überlebt hat, den bezeichne ich als Bruder."

languages.text: « Quiconque a survécu à une bordée de défense avec moi, éperonné et abordé un vaisseau avec moi, et échappé à un massacre dans une série de modules dépressurisés avec moi, est digne d'être mon frère ou ma sœur. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."

traits.locale_text: « Quiconque a survécu à une bordée de défense avec moi, éperonné et abordé un vaisseau avec moi, et échappé à un massacre dans une série de modules dépressurisés avec moi, est digne d'être mon frère. »

languages.text: "Her kim benimle hava savar kalkanlarını kırdıysa, her kim benimle bir gemiye akın edip bordaladıysa, her kim benimle basıncı boşaltılmış modüllerdeki katliamlardan sağ çıktıysa ben onu kardeşim bilirim."
languages.original_text: "Anyone who's broken through a flak shield with me, rammed and boarded a vessel with me, and survived a massacre in depressurised modules with me, I'll call my brother or sister."

traits.locale_text: "Her kim benimle bir hava savunma silahının kalkanlarını kırdıysa, her kim benimle bir gemiye akın edip bordaladıysa, her kim benimle basıncı boşaltılmış modüllerdeki katliamlardan sağ çıktıysa ben onu kardeşim bilirim."
